column5: Well I finally orgainized the lures, took the reels off the rods and pulled the ice fishing box out from under the stairs - guess I've finally admitted to myself that I'm done with the softwater (one of these years I'll have to try a center pin and the rivers but I've spent enough already hehe).  As many of you know I got out A LOT this year (thanks mostly to MikeH and the crazy high gas prices).  I even made it to my first OFC GTG this month and look forward to heading up to Lakair next spring.  The weather certainly wasn't nearly as nice as last year but I managed to try a bunch of new things and lots of new water.  Started moving from just fishing whatever way I felt wherever I happened to be to trying to look at maps, look at weather/water conditions and actually apply some logic to my fishing though I have no idea if it made a difference .  Anyhow, I got bored last night and played around with Google Picasso's video maker and put together a little slide show so if you've got 3 minutes and 14 seconds to kill go ahead and hit play (plus it's easier than pasting all the picture links - damn I'm lazy):  <object width="425" height="349"><param name="movie" value="    Big thanks to everyone I managed to fish with this year and of course everyone on the board for all the great tips, tricks and laughs throughout the season.  Sean
Very nice slide show!...Thanks for sharing
Now that was a kool report Sean  Great tune,lol  Streamerguy

Great recap Sean!  Loved the video idea...I may have to steal it for our year end report!! LOL.  Headed out to Quinte tomorrow for one last kick at the can, then the boat goes away for the winter.  I hear you on the weather this year...it pretty much was touch and go all year long...
Well done there Tbay ! Lots of fishing done there. Great idea with the video. If I do one I will need a shorter tune.
The video picture report set to music is definitely awesome!!  Nicely done and congrats on a fantastic year!!

Great report Sean  Loved to the slideshow     Very cool  Been reading your reports since mid July and you certainly put a lot of time and effort into it  Congratulation    now can't wait for your hard water reports Thanks for taking the time to put it together Leechman
Very cool. Thanks for the effort! Jim
Great picture show. Great shots, and obviously a great year.
Great job puttin that slide show together...enjoyed it!
Nice '08 Sean and great way to put it all together!  Burn it to a DVD and put it in the library.
Great job sean!  the bit i like the best...apart from all the obvious fish porn....lololol....the fish filleting on the back of the truck.
Good stuff Sean, was nice to meet you this fall. Cheers!
good review of your year Sean, you sure did catch some nice fish this year. I liked the whitefish and crappie pics as they were fun days on the water.
awesome year
Well done, looks like you had fun this year
Congrats on a successful year Sean.  Damn, why do i remember seeing all those pictures before ... i'm on OFC way too much lol !
Enjoyed that my man.  Nice slideshow of the 08.  Good luck next year.
Great year Sean man I wish I got too go fishing that much.. oh too Dream
nice slideshow sean.. we'll have to get out in '09
